data.title: Final Fantasy Original Soundtracks
data.meta_description: In Final Fantasy XV, you'll find that the Regalia has a music player that allows you to listen to a variety of different soundtracks spanning all of the
data.text:
In Final Fantasy XV, you'll find that the Regalia has a music player that allows you to listen to a variety of different soundtracks spanning all of the Final Fantasy games.

A few will be playable from the start of the game, but others will be purchasable in shops across Eos, in several of the regions you'll be traveling through.
